Title: Pokémon Ranger and the Temple of the Sea
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: Satoshi Tajiri (creator), Junichi Masuda (creator), Ken Sugimori (creator), Hideki Sonoda, James Carter Cathcart (english adaptation), Hideki Sonoda (screenplay)
Actors: Sarah Natochenny, Michele Knotz, Kayzie Rogers, Bill Rogers
Plot: Our heroes must protect the Prince of the Sea, Manaphy, from the evil pirate Phantom, and return the young Pokémon to the Sea Temple with the help of the the People of the Water and Jackie the Pokémon Ranger.
